original_text: After the men had gone, Ahimaaz and Jonathan climbed out of the well. Then they took the message to David. They said to him, ‘You must go across the river immediately. Ahithophel has told Absalom how he can catch you here.’
korean_text: 그들이 간 후에 두 사람이 우물에서 올라와서 다윗 왕에게 가서 다윗 왕에게 말하여 이르되 당신들은 일어나 빨리 물을 건너가소서 아히도벨이 당신들을 해하려고 이러이러하게 계략을 세웠나이다

sentences.original_text: Ahimaaz and Jonathan climbed out of the well
Then they took the message to David
You must go across the river immediately
how he can catch you here
sentences.korean_translation: 여기서 당신을 어떻게 잡을 수 있는지를
